title: 1900 style font
content:
Hi,

This isnâ€™t quite font ID but close enough. I am working on a project that is a recording of some music by a Spanish composer called Pablo de Sarasate. Does any one know of any fonts that are similar to any of the fonts used in this image?

Any help or suggestions would be great, cheers!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Sarasate Melodien.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090624203132/http:/typophile.com/files/Sarasate%20Melodien.jpg) | 251.02 KB |
author: e.davis

comments.content:
My best suggestion to find fonts representing this era is to search for [Victorian](http://web.archive.org/web/20090624203132/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/victorian/fonts/) and pick some that you think will work. I doubt if you will exactly match these, but you could be true to the feeling of the time period.

- Mike Yanega

You could try a font identifier...

[http://www.linotype.com/fontidentifier?start=1](http://web.archive.org/web/20090624203132/http:/www.linotype.com/fontidentifier?start=1 "http://www.linotype.com/fontidentifier?start=1")
